rules.note: Body has been cooled within 12 hours of cardiac death, skin prep shall begin within 24 hours of death
Body has not been cooled within 12 hours of cardiac death, skin prep shall begin within 15 hours of death
Body is cooled for a period of time then not cooled for a period of time; the time period the body is not cooled cannot exceed 15 cumulative hours

Due to infection
